name: Ley Line Disorder: United Posture - Advance
description:
The Normal Attacks of your characters deal +1 DMG for each Summon on your side of the field.
End Phase: If you have at least 2 Summons of your side of the field, your active character(s) gain 1 Energy.
descriptionraw: The Normal Attacks of your characters deal +1 DMG for each Summon on your side of the field.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If you have at least 2 Summons of your side of the field, your active character(s) gain 1 $[K310].
